mapper.select: SELECT po.poid, po.couponid, po.id, po.qty, po.podate, c.couponname, c.discount, p.pprice, p.pname, p.gsfile FROM gga_product_order po LEFT JOIN gga_coupon c ON po.couponid = c.couponid LEFT JOIN gga_product p ON po.pid = p.pid WHERE po.id = #{id} AND po.podate >= TO_DATE(#{startDate}, 'YYYY-MM-DD') AND po.podate <= TO_DATE(#{endDate}, 'YYYY-MM-DD') + 1 ORDER BY po.podate DESC
